title: LEGO DUPLO Town Big Construction Site Best Toy
feature: Spark young imaginations with a buildable DUPLO Town construction site full of vehicles and fun!
Toddlers can build and play with the bulldozer, dump truck with tipping bucket, and crane with rotating cabin, movable arm, and working claw – plus lots of extra bricks
Includes three construction worker lego DUPLO figures with safety helmets, wheelbarrow, and tools
LEGO DUPLO building toys are made for small hands and are compatible with other lego construction sets for creative building
Bulldozer is over 3” high, 5” long, and 3” wide. Truck is over 4” high, 9” long, and 2” wide. Crane is over 8” high, 11” long, and 4” wide
67 pieces – for boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5 years old
This product can also be used for the new free lego DUPLO stories skill on Echo.
description: Little construction workers will love these 3 buildable machines. Clear the site with the tracked bulldozer, before tipping new building supplies from the truck. Then use the crane with its claw and posable arm to hoist bricks and construct a building. Lego DUPLO large building blocks are specially designed to be safe for little hands. Includes 3 construction worker DUPLO figures to encourage lots of role-play fun. By LEGO DUPLO Town
